message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.SD

The paper proposes a method for online learning and adaptation of deep architectures using reinforcement learning. This topic is closely related to machine learning and artificial intelligence, which are covered by the cs.LG and cs.AI sub-categories. The use of deep architectures suggests a focus on neural networks, which are covered by the cs.NE sub-category. Additionally, the paper mentions experiments involving image data, indicating a possible connection to computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of covariate shift, which is related to domain adaptation and could fall under the cs.SD (statistical learning) sub-category.
